name: LoveBytes
description:
The Agent: A robot wearing a hat.

The Mission: Infiltrate human society.

The Method: Pick-up lines?

--

KRV-21 the robot has gone incognito at the zoo to learn human behavior. The robot has the necessary vocabulary but doesn't quite get puns. Help KRV-21 fill in the blanks and perhaps discover love along the way.

Starring:

  • A lion from The Lion King (one of the background extras)
  • A pile of plushies (rare, discontinued product line)
  • 100% vat-grown meat (it's also organic)

All writing, graphics, and audio somehow made in 72 hours for Sonicworkflow's Valentine's Day jam (2021). Theme: Cringe

One road sign was harmed in the making of this video game. (Literally, Meredith drove too fast in the winter weather because she wanted to get home to keep working on the game. Luckily only the sign was harmed.)
